source.sqlReaderQuery:
with empCTE as(
select EmployeeID, max(StartDate) as StartDate
from Employee
group by EmployeeID
)

select e.EmployeeID, Name, Position, e.StartDate, EndDate
from Employee e
join empCTE em on e.EmployeeID = em.EmployeeID and e.StartDate = em.StartDate
order by EmployeeID asc

WITH empCTE AS (
    SELECT 
        EmployeeID, 
        MAX(EndDate) AS MaxEndDate
    FROM 
        Employee
    GROUP BY 
        EmployeeID
)

SELECT 
    e.EmployeeLogID,
    e.EmployeeID, 
    e.Name, 
    e.Position, 
    e.StartDate, 
    e.EndDate,
    CASE 
        WHEN e.EndDate = em.MaxEndDate THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END AS isLatest
FROM 
    Employee e
JOIN 
    empCTE em 
ON 
    e.EmployeeID = em.EmployeeID 
ORDER BY 
    e.EmployeeID ASC, 
    e.EndDate ASC;

WITH empCTE AS (
    SELECT 
        EmployeeID, 
        MAX(StartDate) AS StartDate
    FROM 
        Employee
    GROUP BY 
        EmployeeID
),
PreviousPositionCTE AS (
    SELECT 
        EmployeeID, 
        Position AS PreviousPosition
    FROM 
        Employee e1
    WHERE 
        StartDate = (
            SELECT 
                MAX(StartDate) 
            FROM 
                Employee e2 
            WHERE 
                e1.EmployeeID = e2.EmployeeID 
                AND e2.StartDate < (
                    SELECT 
                        MAX(StartDate) 
                    FROM 
                        Employee 
                    WHERE 
                        EmployeeID = e1.EmployeeID
                )
        )
)
SELECT 
    e.EmployeeID, 
    e.Name, 
    e.Position, 
    COALESCE(p.PreviousPosition, e.Position) AS PreviousPosition,
    e.StartDate, 
    e.EndDate
FROM 
    Employee e
JOIN 
    empCTE em 
ON 
    e.EmployeeID = em.EmployeeID 
    AND e.StartDate = em.StartDate
LEFT JOIN 
    PreviousPositionCTE p 
ON 
    e.EmployeeID = p.EmployeeID
ORDER BY 
    e.EmployeeID ASC;
